code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var sessionSlice=createSlice({name:'session',initialState:{user:{},isLoggedIn:false},reducers:{signUp:function signUp(state,action){state.user=action.payload;state.isLoggedIn=true;},editUser:function editUser(state,action){state.user=action.payload;},logOut:function logOut(state,action){state.user={};state.isLoggedIn=false;}}});export var selectCurrentUser=function selectCurrentUser(state){return state.session.user;};export var selectIsLoggedIn=function selectIsLoggedIn(state){return state.session.isLoggedIn;};var _sessionSlice$actions=sessionSlice.actions,signUp=_sessionSlice$actions.signUp,logOut=_sessionSlice$actions.logOut,editUser=_sessionSlice$actions.editUser;export{signUp,logOut,editUser};export default sessionSlice.reducer;
